enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-registration - Reserved for Art Theory & Practice, & Art History majors.
title: WCAS ART 390-0-23 Special Topics in Art

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Students engage in collaborative or self-directed projects in animation or an animation-like area (comic book, machinima, gaming, puppet theater, etc.). Students will be introduced to a variety of techniques including stop motion, hand drawn and AfterEffects.

subject: ART
